verses.verse: These <S%H428><s%> also are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron;<s%> <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu,<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> which were <S%H4886>anointed,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to minister in the priest's <S%H3547>office.<s%>

And <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when they <S%H7126>offered<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> and they <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1121>children:<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar<s%> ministered in the priest's <S%H3547>office<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H6440>sight<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> their <S%H1>father.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Bring the tribe of Levi <S%H7126>near,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4294><s%> <S%H3878><s%> and <S%H5975>present<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> that they may <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto him.

And they shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H4931>charge,<s%> and the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And they shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H5647>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons:<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> are wholly <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H5414><s%> unto him out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and they shall wait <S%H8104>on<s%> <S%H853><s%> their priest's <S%H3550>office:<s%> and the <S%H2114>stranger<s%> that cometh <S%H7131>nigh<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

And <S%H589>I,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> from <S%H4480>among<s%> <S%H8432><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> instead <S%H8478>of<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> that <S%H6363>openeth<s%> the <S%H7358>matrix<s%> among the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> therefore the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> mine;

Because <S%H3588><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> are mine; for on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> I <S%H6942>hallowed<s%> unto me <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> both <S%H4480>man<s%> <S%H120><s%> <S%H5704>and<s%> <S%H929>beast:<s%> mine shall they <S%H1961>be:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Number <S%H6485><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> after the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> by their <S%H4940>families:<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> shalt thou <S%H6485>number<s%> them.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> them according <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he was <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> by their <S%H8034>names;<s%> <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> and <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> and <S%H4847>Merari.<s%>
And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> by their <S%H4940>families;<s%> <S%H3845>Libni,<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> by their <S%H4940>families;<s%> <S%H6019>Amram,<s%> and <S%H3324>Izehar,<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H5816>Uzziel.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> by their <S%H4940>families;<s%> <S%H4249>Mahli,<s%> and <S%H4187>Mushi.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> according to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

Of <S%H1648>Gershon<s%> was the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3846>Libnites,<s%> and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H8097>Shimites:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites.<s%>

Those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2145>males,<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> even those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them were <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>
The <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> shall <S%H2583>pitch<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H3220>westward.<s%>
And the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> shall be <S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3815>Lael.<s%>

And the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1647>Gershon<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> shall be the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and the <S%H168>tent,<s%> the <S%H4372>covering<s%> thereof, and the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%>

And the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> and the <S%H4539>curtain<s%> for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> and the <S%H4340>cords<s%> of it for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> thereof.

And of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> was the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H6020>Amramites,<s%> and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H3325>Izeharites,<s%> and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H2276>Hebronites,<s%> and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H5817>Uzzielites:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites.<s%>

In the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2145>males,<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> were <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> <S%H8104>keeping<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>
The <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath<s%> shall <S%H2583>pitch<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H8486>southward.<s%>

And the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6956>Kohathites<s%> shall be <S%H469>Elizaphan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel.<s%>

And their <S%H4931>charge<s%> shall be the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and the <S%H7979>table,<s%> and the <S%H4501>candlestick,<s%> and the <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> <S%H834>wherewith<s%> they <S%H8334>minister,<s%> and the <S%H4539>hanging,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5656>service<s%> thereof.

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall be <S%H5387>chief<s%> over the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and have the <S%H6486>oversight<s%> of them that <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>

Of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> was the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4250>Mahlites,<s%> and the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4188>Mushites:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari.<s%>

And those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2145>males,<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

And the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> was <S%H6700>Zuriel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H32>Abihail:<s%> these shall <S%H2583>pitch<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3409>side<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H6828>northward.<s%>

And under the <S%H6486>custody<s%> and <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> shall be the <S%H7175>boards<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and the <S%H1280>bars<s%> thereof, and the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> thereof, and the <S%H134>sockets<s%> thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> thereof, and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H5656>serveth<s%> thereto,
And the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets,<s%> and their <S%H3489>pins,<s%> and their <S%H4340>cords.<s%>

But those that <S%H2583>encamp<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> toward the <S%H6924>east,<s%> even <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> <S%H4217>eastward,<s%> shall be <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H8104>keeping<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> for the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and the <S%H2114>stranger<s%> that cometh <S%H7131>nigh<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> throughout their <S%H4940>families,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2145>males<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6485>Number<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H2145>males<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> and <S%H5375>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of their <S%H8034>names.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> for me <S%H589>(I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD)<s%> instead <S%H8478>of<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and the <S%H929>cattle<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> instead <S%H8478>of<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstlings<s%> among the <S%H929>cattle<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853>him,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> <S%H2145>males<s%> by the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names,<s%> from a <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H4480>old<s%> <S%H1121><s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> of those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and threescore and <S%H7969>thirteen.<s%> <S%H7657><s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> instead <S%H8478>of<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H929>cattle<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> instead <S%H8478>of<s%> their <S%H929>cattle;<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> mine: <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And for those that are to be <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> of the two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and threescore and <S%H7969>thirteen<s%> <S%H7657><s%> of the <S%H4480>firstborn<s%> <S%H1060><s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which are <S%H5736>more<s%> <S%H5921>than<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites;<s%>

Thou shalt even <S%H3947>take<s%> five shekels <S%H2568>apiece<s%> <S%H2568><s%> <S%H8255><s%> by the <S%H1538>poll,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> shalt thou <S%H3947>take<s%> them: (the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> gerahs: <S%H1626>)<s%>
And thou shalt <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H3701>money,<s%> wherewith the odd <S%H5736>number<s%> of them is to be <S%H6299>redeemed,<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6306>redemption<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H854><s%> them that were <S%H5736>over<s%> and <S%H5921>above<s%> them that were <S%H6306>redeemed<s%> by the Levites: <S%H3881><s%>

Of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853>he<s%> the <S%H3701>money;<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> shekels, after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the sanctuary: <S%H6944><s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> of them that were <S%H6306>redeemed<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> according <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
